body: At 15th level, a reanimator adds create greater undead to his formula book as a 5th-level extract. This otherwise acts similarly to a create undead extract. This ability replaces the increase to bomb damage at this level.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Reanimator/Create Greater Undead
name: Create Greater Undead
